title: Get Current Profile
description: Retrives the profile information of a currently logged in user

expand.description: This field determines the additional properties to be returned. Possible value for this query parameter is ‘accessRights’ to include accessRights of the current profile.

includedRoles.description: This field determines if only organizational roles or all roles are to be returned for the current profile. Default value is 'organizationalRolesForCurrentOrganization’. Possible values are 'organizationalRolesForCurrentOrganization’, 'allRolesForCurrentOrganization’.
